title: The Bunnyhop, Episode 2: Teniel Campbell and Sophie Wright
content:
The second episode of The Bunnyhop has landed, featuring Team BikeExchange’s Teniel Campbell and Alè BTC Ljubljana’s Sophie Wright on her home roads in Norfolk.

Presented by Rebecca Charlton along with Jo Rowsell and Sophie Hurcom, the show brings you race highlights, analysis and original rider features.

Check out their second episode above.
author: Abby Mickey
